content.question: Which of the following best explains a likely significant purpose behind Yanaihara publishing his article in a Canadian journal?

choices.label: Yanaihara wished to justify continued Japanese colonial rule of Korea to potentially hostile Western states.
Yanaihara wished to intimidate potential Western rivals by describing Japanâ€™s industrial power.
Yanaihara sought to open free trade with Canada in order to alleviate the effects of the Great Depression.
Yanaihara sought to pass on Japanese industrial expertise to underdeveloped countries.

content.answer: Yanaihara wished to justify continued Japanese colonial rule of Korea to potentially hostile Western states.

topic.text: 7.5: Unresolved Tensions after World War I

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Explain the significance of a source's point of view, purpose, historical situation, and/or audience, including how these might limit the use(s) of a source.
